Class RoundRect

This class represents an rectangle object which contains start point (x, y) and size (width, height) with radius in four corners.

Hierarchy

  • RoundRect

Methods

applyBorder

  • applyBorder(top: number, right: number, bottom: number, left: number): RoundRect
    • Defined in base/RoundRect.ts:131

    Calculate the inner RoundRect by current instance and give borders in 4 directions.

    Parameters

    • top: number

      top border.

    • right: number

      right border.

    • bottom: number

      bottom border.

    • left: number

      left border.

    Returns RoundRect

    The current instance if all borders are 0, or a new RoundRect object which presents the result of current instance applies the borders.

applyRadius

  • applyRadius(radiusLeftTop?: BaseValue, radiusRightTop?: BaseValue, radiusRightBottom?: BaseValue, radiusLeftBottom?: BaseValue): RoundRect
    • Defined in base/RoundRect.ts:95

    Apply the given radius of 4 corners.

    Parameters

    • Optional radiusLeftTop: BaseValue

      radius in left-top corner.

    • Optional radiusRightTop: BaseValue

      height in right-top corner.

    • Optional radiusRightBottom: BaseValue

      radius in right-bottom corner.

    • Optional radiusLeftBottom: BaseValue

      radius in left-bottom corner.

    Returns RoundRect

    The current instance. Useful for chaining method calls.

    • Defined in base/RoundRect.ts:81

    • height: number

Private arcTo

  • arcTo(x1: number, y1: number, x0: number, y0: number, x2: number, y2: number, ctx: CanvasRenderingContext2D): void
    • Defined in base/RoundRect.ts:230

    Adds a circular arc to the current sub-path, using the given control points and radius.

    Parameters

    • x1: number

      The X coordinate of the source point.

    • y1: number

      The Y coordinate of the source point.

    • x0: number

      The X coordinate of the corner point.

    • y0: number

      The Y coordinate of the corner point.

    • x2: number

      The X coordinate of the destination point.

    • y2: number

      The Y coordinate of the destination point.

    • ctx: CanvasRenderingContext2D

      The rendering context of target canvas.

    Returns void

    The current instance. Useful for chaining method calls.

    • Defined in base/RoundRect.ts:211

    Make a clip of current RoundRect object to a canvas.

    Parameters

    • ctx: CanvasRenderingContext2D

      The rendering context of target canvas.

    Returns RoundRect

    The current instance. Useful for chaining method calls.

makePath

  • makePath(ctx: CanvasRenderingContext2D, newPath: boolean, clockwise: boolean): void
    • Defined in base/RoundRect.ts:171

    Makes a path of current RouncRect object.

    Parameters

    • ctx: CanvasRenderingContext2D

      The rendering context of target canvas.

    • newPath: boolean

      If true, start a new path, otherwise continue the previous path.

    • clockwise: boolean

      The directions of the path.

    Returns void

toRect

  • toRect(): Rect
    • Defined in base/RoundRect.ts:71

    Convert current RoundRect object to a Rect object by dropping radius.

    Returns Rect

    a Rect object with same position and size.
